    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Research Methods in Political Science &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Sep 14, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/researchmethodspsc
     </span>

        Print Guide
       </a>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17117288">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17117288">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17117288">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Articles: Databases &amp; Indexes
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117288">
          <p>
           <b>
            Subject-Specific Databases: Political Science
           </b>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/pais/ip?accountid=40980">
             PAIS
            </a>
            <br />
            Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, policy briefs, government publications, and more from on domestic and international political, economic, social and public policy issues. Use the Check for Full Text&nbsp;buttons&nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://search.proquest.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/wpsa/advanced?accountid=40980">
             Worldwide Political Science Abstracts
            </a>
            <br />
            Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, policy briefs, government publications, and more in political science and complementary fields, including international relations, law, and public administration/policy. Use the Check for Full Text&nbsp;buttons&nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            Think Tank Search
            <br />
            <a href="http://guides.library.harvard.edu/hks/think_tank_search">
             http://guides.library.harvard.edu/hks/think_tank_search
            </a>
            <br />
            "Think Tank Search is a custom Google search of more than 450 think tank websites. For the purposes of this search, think tanks are defined as institutions affiliated with universities, governments, advocacy groups, foundations, non-governmental organizations, and businesses that generate public policy research, analysis, and activity. Inclusion is based upon the relevancy of subject area to HKS [Harvard Kennedy School] coursework and scholarship, the availability of the think tank&rsquo;s research in full-text on the website, and the think tank&rsquo;s reputation and influence upon policy making. The list represents a mixture of partisan and non-partisan think tanks."
            <br />
            &gt;&gt;See also the "US" and "Non-US" tabs for lists of and links to individual think tanks.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
           <b>
            Interdisciplinary Databases
           </b>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Note: These databases may include both scholarly and popular sources.
           </em>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
             Academic Search Complete
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including political science. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text&nbsp;buttons&nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://search.proquest.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/assia/advanced?accountid=40980">
             ASSIA: Applied Social Sciences Index and Abstracts
            </a>
            <br />
            Citations to scholarly journals in sociology, psychology, political science, health, social work, education, and more. Use the&nbsp;Check for Full Text&nbsp;buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://www.jstor.org.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/action/showAdvancedSearch?acc=on&amp;wc=on">
             JSTOR
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of scholarly journals for most academic disciplines. The most recent three to five years of most journals are not included. Full text is linked directly in the database.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic">
             LexisNexis Academic
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts, as well as business publications, legal materials, and more. Full text is linked directly in the database.
           </p>
           <p style="text-align: left;" noshade="noshade" size="1" width="45%" align="center">
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm">
             Omnifile
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of scholarly and non-scholarly journals covering various subjects including general sciences, humanities, social sciences, and business. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text&nbsp;buttons&nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17117288" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18469803">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18469803">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18469803">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting the Full Text of Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10536644">
          <p>
           To get the full text of an article, consider the following options:
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you are in Encompass Search or a library database, look for "Check for Full Text buttons," "Access Online," or "Check eResources" buttons. These buttons will take you the full text of the article or tell you that the full text cannot be found. If the full text is not available from Trexler Library, look for buttons to request the item from another library via interlibrary loan. Or go directly to the
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           request forms.
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you have citation information for the article (i.e., journal title, article title, publication year, etc.), type the information about your article in
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           on the library website. If the library subscribes to the full text, you will be directed to the article (see first bullet above). If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           - If Trexler Library does not have access to the full text of the article, search
           <a href="http://www.google.com/scholar">
            Google Scholar
           </a>
           by article title to see if the author has made a copy freely available online. If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10536644" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18469807">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18469807">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18469807">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17118116">
          <p>
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/discovery">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           finds information by searching through a massive collection of books, scholarly journals, newspapers and magazines, dissertations, conference proceedings, music, video, maps, and more.&nbsp;
          </p>
          <p>
           To find only books, use the Books limit on the left sidebar of your search results page. Many items will be in Trexler Library; note the call number and status of the item to check its location and availability. For items not in Trexler Library, use the Interlibrary Loan to request a copy from another library.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17118116" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17117290">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17117290">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17117290">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Polling Information / Sample Survey Questions
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117290">
          <p>
           American Attitudes: What Americans Think About the Issues That Shape Their Lives (6th ed., 2010)
           <br />
           Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 303.38 M685a 2010
          </p>
          <p>
           American National Election Studies
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.electionstudies.org/">
            http://www.electionstudies.org/
           </a>
           <br />
           <em>
            "Produces high quality data on voting, public opinion, and political participation."
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           Gallup
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.gallup.com/home.aspx">
            http://www.gallup.com/home.aspx
           </a>
           <br />
           <em>
            Presents daily briefings on a single current topic, as well as recent Gallup Poll findings.
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           Polling Report
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.pollingreport.com/">
            http://www.pollingreport.com/
            <br />
           </a>
           <em>
            Biweekly overview of recent poll trends.
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           Public Opinion Quarterly -- "The Polls"
           <br />
           Location:
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/direct.asp?db=ufh&amp;jid=POQ&amp;scope=site">
            Online
           </a>
           or search the library catalog by journal title.
           <br />
           <em>
            Regular feature of preeminent scholarly journal on public opinion and polling, discusses recent surveys.&nbsp; Browse through each issue to access "The Polls" or search across the journal by topic to check for features on your topic.
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17117290" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18469824">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18469824">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18469824">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Your Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18460062">
          <ul>
           <li>
            For information on
            <strong>
             why to cite your sources
            </strong>
            and
            <strong>
             how to avoid plagiarism
            </strong>
            , see the
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3856388">
             Get Started with Library Research: Cite Sources
            </a>
            guide.
            <br />
            <br />
           </li>
           <li>
            For help using
            <strong>
             Chicago style
            </strong>
            , consult the following resources::
           </li>
          </ul>
          <blockquote>
           <ul>
            <li>
             <em>
              The Chicago manual of style
             </em>
             (16th ed., 2010)
             <br />
             Location:
             <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=Http://www.chicagomanualofstyle.org/16/contents.html">
              Online
             </a>
             or search Encompass Search by title or Ready Reference 808.027 C632m
            </li>
           </ul>
           <ul>
            <li>
             Chicago Manual of Style (Purdue Online Writing Lab)
             <br />
             <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/717/01/">
              http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/717/01/
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
           <ul>
            <li>
             Chicago Style (Trexler Library, Muhlenberg College)
             <br />
             <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/media/content,assets/library/docs/chicago_example.pdf">
              http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/media/content,assets/library/docs/chicago_example.pdf
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
           <ul>
            <li>
             Chicago/Turabian Documentation Style (Writing Center, University of Wisconsin--Madison)
             <br />
             <a href="http://www.wisc.edu/writing/Handbook/DocChicago.html" target="_blank">
              http://www.wisc.edu/writing/Handbook/DocChicago.html
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </blockquote>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
             Zotero
            </a>
            <br />
            "Free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research sources." Download instructions and help available on the site.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt18460062" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4652327" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox18469790">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18469790">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18469790">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need Help with Your Research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117745">
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           <b>
            Jen Jarson
           </b>
           <br />
           Social Sciences Reference Librarian
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3552
           <br />
           email: jarson@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
          </p>
          <p>
